name: Black Wings Over Wildwood
description:
You're new to the town of Inwood, a sleepy suburb in between the forbidding woods and the heart of the city. It's weird that your parents are never home anymore, and you can't explain the shadows you see at night.

I'm sure it's nothing.

Try to make some friends. Or you could join the History Club you heard about. I'm sure they're dying to meet you.

Content Warnings Some blood and disturbing imagery

Black Wings Over Wildwood is an episodic visual novel in which choices are the difference between life and death. Say the wrong thing or go it alone, and you may end up the next victim of the Inwood Killer.

  • Learn the dark history of Inwood and the purported witch, Desdemona
  • Spend your day with the members of the History Club, grief-stricken Winnie, angry loner Nico, or avid researcher Quentin
  • Watch for the creatures that lurk in the shadows
  • 4 good endings, 4 bad endings; replay to explore them all!
  • Average playthrough: 30 min. 100% playthrough: 2 hr.

Dev Notes

Hey, V Wolfram here. Release 0.1.0 is just the first chapter in Black Wings. I'm a one-man team with no playtesters, so writing/coding/testing is a time-consuming process. If you're interested in seeing more of Black Wings, let me know in the comments below; it will keep me motivated to continue the project. If you have recommendations or notice bugs, please let me know in the comments as well.

If you like this, feel free to check out my Spooktober Game Jam submission, Black Wings No Hope.
